page.title: 06Interesting people
page.content: My name is{Mr Townsend}.I live in {Stanbury}and have lived here for some years.I like{Stanbury.}I work in {Bradford}and commute 15 miles a day.In winter it is difficult to travel. My house is a detached cottage.I mix with people at the friendly village pub.There are no cinemas or curry houses in{Stanbury.}People go to {Bradford}or{Leeds}for entertainment.In my spare time I try to improve my water supply.The water is pumped from a spring.I enjoy walking,climbing and reading.We have a church here but I do not go.I am not very religious. {Stanbury}is no longer a quiet place.{Ponden Mill,}once used for weaving,is now a mill shop.The reservoir is used for sailing and windsurfing but not for fishing.People do not hunt rabbits as they used to.
